markdown: Temple of Berath;The Hanging Sepulchers;Forgotten Mausoleum | main_npcs = High Priest Kasu;Yseyr the Berathian | quest_giver = | xp_amount = 1500 | xp_type = Normal | xp_level = 11 | xp_weights = 1;1;1 | rewardname1 = Return the tablets | reward1 = [Ruata's Walking Cloak](/ruatasWalkingCloak/);[Girdle of Mortal Protection](/girdleOfMortalProtectionDeadfire/) | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [side quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsSideQuests/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Kasu, High Priest of Berath, wants to recover a sacred text, the Eulogy of Yseyr. The eulogy rests in the catacombs under the Sacred Stair, a place where only those marked by Berath may enter. ## Walkthrough * Visit High Priest Kasu (Temple of Berath) to start the quest. Nearing death, he wants to obtain the eulogy, but explains that the tombs only open to those baring Berath's chime. Kasu gives you [The Eel's Coil](/theEelsCoil/), an item which will resonate with your "chime" to open the entrance to [The Hanging Sepulchers](/theHangingSepulchers/), found on the lower walkway outside the temple. * The eulogy itself was split into three odes written by Yseyr's champions, and placed next to their tombs. Finding those tombs will be the first step. The locations of the tombs are covered on the page [The Hanging Sepulchers](/theHangingSepulchers/), including a way to talk Yseyr himself down. * Once you have obtained all three tablets ([Eulogy to Yseyr - The Vigil](/eulogyToYseyrTheVigil/), [Eulogy to Yseyr - The Gate](/eulogyToYseyrTheGate/), and [Eulogy to Yseyr - The Sword](/eulogyToYseyrTheSword/)) return to the priest. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/07_Neketaka_Temple_District/07_QST_Eulogy.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Eulogy for the Dead''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Kasu, High Priest of Berath, wants to recover a sacred text, the Eulogy of Yseyr. The eulogy rests in the catacombs under the Sacred Stair, a place where only those marked by Berath may enter. |- | rowspan="5" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Descend into the Hanging Sepulchers.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Kasu said that the Eulogy of Yseyr was etched into stone tablets that now rest in The Hanging Sepulchers, a complex of catacombs carved under the Sacred Stair. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | I can find the main entrance to the Hanging Sepulchers right outside the Temple of Berath, in the lower walkway. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | Only those bearing the mark of Berath may use the Eel's Coil, a symbol of the goddess, to enter the tombs under the temple. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | I've acquired the Eel's Coil. |- | rowspan="8" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Search the Hanging Sepulchers for Yseyr's Eulogy.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | I've found a way inside the Hanging Sepulchers, and can begin my search. The eulogy was split into odes written by Yseyr's champions, and placed next to their tombs. Finding those tombs will be the first step. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20006 | I found the final piece of the Eulogy of Yseyr. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20005 | A massive door bars further passage into the Hanging Sepulchers. The door is flanked by two skeletons, each adorned by a symbol - one, that of a gate, the other a lantern. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20003 | I've read part of The Eulogy of Yseyr. His champion Faywden, the Lady of Vigils, battled beside him wielding a mace. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20008 | I've acquired part of the eulogy, a section referring to The Vigil. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20004 | I've read part of The Eulogy of Yseyr. Kasu will be eager to obtain the information contained within. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I've brought to Kasu the stone tablets containing the Eulogy to Yseyr. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | Someone critical to this quest has died. |}
